error.signature: Error: Unsupported block type or invalid dynamic block iterator
error.regex: (Unsupported block type .+ dynamic|invalid dynamic block|dynamic .+ iterator|Blocks of type .+ not expected here|dynamic .+ content block)

verdict.summary: Dynamic block used with an unsupported block type or has incorrect iterator/content configuration.

dead_ends.action: Use dynamic blocks for attributes that are not block types
dead_ends.why_fails: Dynamic blocks can only generate nested block types, not simple attributes; use for expressions for lists/maps

dead_ends.action: Nest dynamic blocks more than two levels deep
dead_ends.why_fails: Deeply nested dynamic blocks become unreadable and error-prone; refactor into modules instead

workarounds.action: Verify the block type name matches the resource schema exactly
workarounds.how: dynamic "block_name" must match a nested block type in the resource; check provider documentation for valid block names

workarounds.action: Use the correct iterator and content block syntax
workarounds.how: dynamic "name" { for_each = var.list; content { attr = name.value.attr } } - iterator defaults to the dynamic block label
